Package dev.meldau.sca

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CBOCalculator
    This class calculates the Coupling Between Objects metric for a provided program in form of a multigraph
    ClassFileFinder
    Finds all class files in a given directory
    CouplingMultiGraphGenerator
    Generates directed multigraph
    FeedbackArcSetFinder
    Implements FeedbackArcSet Algorithm from https://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/download?
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on sca-maven-plugin.
    Call mvn sca:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
    InformativeEdge
    Class which extends DefaultEdge of jgrapht by making getSource() and getTarget() public
    JdepsGraphCreator
    Create Java Dependencies Graph
    LabeledEdge
    Class which extends DefaultEdge of jgrapht by adding Labels.
    LCOMScoreCalculator
    Implements LCOM Score Calculation (Lack Of Cohesion in Methods) as proposed by Hitz and Montazeri in 1995 https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Martin-Hitz/publication/2765140_Measuring_Product_Attributes_of_Object-Oriented_Systems/links/0912f51091f5fa52aa000000/Measuring-Product-Attributes-of-Object-Oriented-Systems.pdf
    SCACohesionMojo
    This Mojo can be used for calculating code cohesion.
    SCACohesionReportingMojo
    Cohesion Reporting Mojo
    SCACouplingCBOReportingMojo
    Coupling Between Objects (CBO) Reporting Mojo
    SCACouplingMojo
    This Mojo can be used for calculating Coupling Between Objects (CBO).
    SCACouplingPairCBOReportingMojo
    Pairwise Coupling Between Objects (pair CBO) Reporting Mojo
    SCACyclesMojo
    Searches for cyclic dependcies if cyclic dependencies are found a FeedbackArcSet is calculated to show the user which dependencies may be removed to break the cycle
    SCACyclesReportingMojo
    Cyclic dependencies reporting Mojo
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConnectionType
    Enum of all connection types for couplings
